紛紜畫船搖彩傘，點綴流光盛景色。
雜物艇中任飄揚，杯盞袋囊語笑發。

波光瀲灩樂無涯，嬉戲忘返日已斜。
繁華一隅會友時，忘卻尘凡疾與慢。

paragraph: The image depicts a young girl sitting on a bench, holding a blue bag in her hands. She is leaning against the bench with her back to the wall, posing for a photo. There are several other people present in the scene, including a man and a woman, who can be seen standing nearby.
answer:
在長椅靜坐少女細，
手握藍袋恬不知。
背靠牆壁擺姿勢，
攝影留瞬豔陽時。

周圍人群皆侍立，
男女相望言語私。
繁華背景異庭色，
一格定格美青春。

paragraph: The image depicts a baseball game on a field, with several players engaged in the game. There is a man standing behind the pitcher, holding a baseball bat as he prepares to swing at the ball. Other players can be seen scattered around the field, some of whom are wearing helmets and protective gear. A number of people can be seen walking around the field, either near or far away from the players. They may be spectators watching the game, or they may be part of the playing team themselves.
answer:
在綠野之中賽事鬧，
球手揮棒意氣高。
鱗次櫛比甲兵立，
盔帽蔽日衛體巧。

壘道間散步人影，
或觀或戰身影搖。
皮球飛舞揚塵土，
猶如戰場英雄豪。

場上緊張氣氛揚，
捕手守候瞬間忙。
觀眾旁觀或起舞，
此豈凡間一番場。

大夢誰願定輸贏，
球迷心中戰火生。
一揮即決勝負手，
綠茵場上展風情。

paragraph: The image depicts a train station with two trains on the tracks. There is a yellow and green train traveling down the tracks, while another one is parked in the middle of the platform. A number of people can be seen standing around the train, either waiting for the train to arrive or watching it from a distance. Additionally, there are several chairs scattered throughout the scene, providing additional seating options for passengers.
answer:
碧軌黃鐵疾如箭，
一列綠班正中站。
旅人候載亦觀望，
散坐椅間話短長。

車聲隆隆動地通，
絡繹人潮聚又散。
往來如織夢裡航，
鐵道旅情伴煙霞。

paragraph: The image features a brown horse standing in a field, wearing a harness. The horse's head is tilted towards the left side of the image, while its body is placed closer to the right side. It appears to be working on a farm, as there are several other horses scattered around the scene.
answer:
碧野耕曦馬儀騰，
棕蹄穩立影斜蓁。
橫頭望左情何往，
右側身姿繫日曾。

銜勁繩間載夢耘，
耦耕馳影碧空層。
農歌遙隨風遞送，
疏影馬群各自能。

paragraph: The image depicts a group of people playing a video game on a computer screen. There are several people present in the scene, including two men and a woman standing near them. A number of other people can be seen sitting around the gaming area, watching the players play their favorite games. One man is wearing a red shirt, while another one is wearing a blue shirt. All of the people appear to be enjoying themselves as they play the game together.
answer:
畫中逸趣網海深，
紅衣男子指尖舞。
藍衫伴侶旁談笑，
女子立側觀戲穩。

眾人繞屏成環坐，
游子爭峰樂融融。
絲絲碼流投影間，
情誼共享遊戲中。

paragraph: The image depicts a woman playing tennis on a tennis court. She is holding a tennis racket in her hand, ready to hit the ball with it. There are several other people present in the scene, including a man and a woman. They appear to be enjoying their time on the court while watching the game.
answer:
在綠蔭球場風光好，
揮拍女將颯然搖。
白線間隔勝負處，
黃球飛旋逐影饒。

旁觀者眾憩影下，
男女笑語看翠梢。
鬥志如春生意足，
似此閑時何處找。

paragraph: The image depicts two giraffes standing in a natural setting, with one of the giraffes facing away from the camera. The other giraffe is closer to the camera, and can be seen walking along the dirt path near the trees. Both giraffes appear healthy and well-groomed, which suggests that they are enjoying their time outdoors.
answer:
在野地中兩麒麟矗，
長頸伸向碧空添幅。
一面背影隱幽林，
另一近攝步徑交踱。

塵徑漫行近樹陰，
毛髮光澤動風吟。
健康之相樂融融，
天地悠哉享自然。

臥日嬌陽澤下漫，
情趣盎然笑斑斕。
叢中相映攜伴行，
麒麟閒庭步驟坦。

paragraph: The image depicts a busy train station with several traffic lights, including two red and one green. There is also a pedestrian crossing sign in the background, which indicates that trains are not allowed to pass through the intersection. Two cars can be seen in the scene, one on the left side of the road and another on the right side.
answer:
在鐵道旁繁忙站，
紅綠燈下車潮湧。
兩紅綠一交錯亮，
列車止步人行中。

遙望行人指標立，
示警蒸汽不得行。
左車靜卧鐵軌旁，
右輪佇候信號鳴。

踏過斑馬軌上風，
時光列車緩行空。
城市輪轉日夜長，
留此一幕晨昏同。

paragraph: The image features a yellow train traveling down the tracks near a residential area. There is a clock visible on the side of the train, which indicates that the train has arrived at its destination. A number of people are present in the scene, including a man and a woman, as well as a dog and a cat.
answer:
黃裳鐵馬啣霞光，軌間穿越居處旁。
時刻顯明終點至，鐘情昭示客歸場。

男儀女態共肩行，犬吠貓踽添情狀。
生活畫卷輕翻動，鐵輪滾滾譜今朝。

paragraph: The image features a surfer riding a wave on a white surfboard in the ocean. The man appears to be having fun as he jumps into the air and catches a large wave. There are multiple surfboards present in the scene, some of which can be seen closer to the camera. A group of people can be seen scattered around the area, with one person located near the center of the image and another placed towards the right side.
answer:
翻浪騎士白板飛，
碧海長空自在揮。
群英散布海岸邊，
一躍浪頭笑聲隨。

碧波蕩漾人躍起，
巧遇巨浪匹配奇。
左邊一坐看風景，
右側孤影伴浪移。

浪尖舞者心悠閒，
海濤輕捧勇者肩。
銀色沙灘見證者，
激流勇進喜愛連。

paragraph: The image depicts a white plate with two sandwiches on it, one of which is cut in half. There are toothpicks placed at the top of the sandwich to hold it in place. A pickle is also present on the plate, and can be found closer to the center of the plate.
answer:
白盤擺雅饌，堆疊兩段心。
夾生一片黃瓜，斜插牙籤針。
半剖展其裡，夾杂餡香深。
簡餐亦風雅，滋味藏匠心。

paragraph: The image depicts a busy beach scene with many people relaxing under red umbrellas. There are several chairs scattered around the beach, some of which are placed closer to the shore and others further away. A number of people can be seen kneeling down on the ground, enjoying their time at the beach. Additionally, there is a handbag located in the middle of the scene, likely belonging to one of the visitors. Overall, the scene offers a glimpse of a fun-filled day at the beach.
answer:
紅傘下沙灘歡，繁華畫卷海天間。
椅隨意散各尋坐，近岸遠砂各別安。
膝下親親土地樂，沙中寶盒誰人願。
悠悠浪花笑聲中，一日海邊樂無限。

paragraph: The image depicts three giraffes in a grassy field, with one of the adult giraffes standing close to the other two. There are several trees surrounding the scene, creating a lush and green environment for the giraffes to enjoy.
answer:
在草原深處三長頸，
一大偕小，關係密切。
樹影婆娑風輕拂，
綠野幽境，自在悠閒。

頸如樓塔挺雲端，
紋斑間隙，日影斑斑。
葉語間聞悠長曲，
長頸鹿家，安享天寬。

paragraph: The image depicts a blue and white bus traveling down a street, passing by several trees. There is also a person sitting on the side of the road, possibly waiting for the bus to arrive.
answer:
蒼藍巴士滑過街，
旁若白楊樹影拖。
獨坐路邊人望眼，
此停此往待君抵。

疾風馳過枝葉間，
輪轍輕卷塵煙散。
行人依依思故里，
往來踟躕盼歸安。

paragraph: The image features a tray with three hamburgers, two fries, and a cup of soda. The hamburgers are placed on top of the tray, while the fries are spread out across the table. There is also a cup of soda in the scene, which can be found closer to the center of the table.
answer:
三堡盤上齊，雙薯橫陳開。
碳飲中央立，盛宴輕鬆來。

匠心裁食藝，麵肉和諧堆。
黃金薯條旁，絲絲鹹香揮。

暢享西風味，炭泉伴味添。
閒話笑聲間，美味滿桌圍。

paragraph: The image features a yellow dump truck driving down the street, along with several other vehicles in the background. There is a bus on the left side of the road, while another bus can be seen closer to the center of the scene. A large number of people are also present in the scene, including pedestrians and commuters.
answer:
於塵世匆匆道旁間，
黃巨獸載土行無間。
鐵甲巴士左側排，
中繼又見其兄嗣連。

人潮繁多交錯行，
步行及等候，遍人群。
車輛縱橫，行色匆匆，
都市節奏，嘈雜交融。

煙霧繚繞途徑長，
轟鳴聲中顯繁忙。
輪轍畫道，傳尘土上，
軌跡皆成此地常。

塵世喧囂何時息，
鋼鐵巨獸共道闊。
人來人往，潮如海，
歲月枯藤，記載軌跡。

paragraph: The image depicts a group of horses walking along a riverside, with many of them standing near the water. There is a large number of horses in the scene, some of which are closer to the water and others further away. Some of the horses appear to be more mature than others, suggesting that they may have been born recently. Other horses can be seen scattered throughout the scene, including several that are younger and less experienced.
answer:
江畔馬群行，汗蹄拾翠微。
河風拂鬃絲，群駒戲水畔。
離水近幾許，隱隱更遙遠。
驕陽下，幼駒新，輕躍少年疾。

浪花濺踏聲，長天憬歡笑。
馬影斜陽裡，遠望霞光飄。
古道旁，野性蠻，自在無拘捆。
馳騁間，翠微深，天地任馳騁。

paragraph: The image features a group of giraffes walking in a grassy field near a tree. There are three giraffes in the scene, with one closer to the camera and two more towards the left side of the frame. All three giraffes appear healthy and well-groomed, which is likely due to their natural habitat.
answer:
翠野漫步長頸群，
三影斑斕入畫分。
近影傲立攝心近，
遠踪成雙樹旁吟。

草原息育生輝煌，
恣意逍遙各自忙。
嬌育天成皮毛亮，
自然恩賜最豐厚。

paragraph: The image features a group of people sitting at desks, working on their laptops. There are several men present in the scene, with some standing closer to the camera while others sit further away. Some of the men appear to be engaged in a discussion or brainstorming session as they work on their laptops. A number of cups can be seen scattered around the room, suggesting that there may be a conference taking place.
answer:
繁忙筆下電光飛，
坐立群賢策略堆。
幾士論商或筆談，
思緒交織譜新篇。

遠近錯落屏前影，
杯盞閒散證時催。
或有深談雷霆決，
會中風雲各展才。

paragraph: The image depicts a large pot filled with broccoli, carrots, and other vegetables. There are several pieces of broccoli scattered around the pan, while some carrots can be seen closer to the center of the dish. A spoon is also present in the scene, which could be used to stir or mix the vegetables together.
answer:
翠綠悠然爐火旁，
錦囊蔬菜入鍋藏。
橙紅蕪蔥添色彩，
散落羽花瑣碎忙。

湯匙孤影伴風煙，
攪動萬千滋味藏。
生活調和如此鍋，
燜煮時光味更香。

paragraph: The image depicts two girls sitting on a bus, talking on their cell phones. One of the girls is wearing a red sweater while the other one is wearing a white shirt. They appear to be having a good time together as they enjoy each other's company. There are several bags scattered around the scene, some of which can be seen in the background.
answer:
雙影並肩坐巴士，
紅衣白衫各怡神。
移聲悅耳聊天機，
笑語輕飄友情深。

散落四旁行囊中，
背景嫋嫋添亂紋。
雖然匆忙路途遠，
心悅同行不覺勤。

時光車輪轉瞬過，
悄言嬌語慰彼此。
忘卻車窗外急景，
友誼歲月長流綺。

paragraph: The image depicts a large blue and white airplane on the runway of an airport. There is a passenger plane in the background, which can be seen closer to the center of the scene. A number of cars are also present in the scene, with one car located near the middle of the runway.
answer:
在跑道盡頭靜臥巨鳥，
藍白之軀閃耀著光澤。
旅人的夢在機翼振翅，
晨曦下，輪跡嶄新，路網錯綜。

背景處興起另一銀翼，
準備於蒼穹織起新篇章。
穿梭車輛於是席上舞蹈，
一輛孤立行踪跑道中央。

風吹過跑道溫柔的話語，
機身閃動著出發前的序語。
跨越了大海，它將高飛，
劃破雲霄，航途萬里情懷傳。

人們許願於激昂鋼鐵之翼，
狂野靈魂醞釀著冒險熱情。
一幅幅流動的景致匆匆過客，
故事開啟，在跑道的起點寫情。

paragraph: The image features a mannequin laying in a suitcase, with his head resting on top of the body. A blue blanket can be seen covering the mannequin's head, creating a cozy atmosphere for the viewer. There are several handbags scattered around the scene, including one that is placed closer to the mannequin.
answer:
於行李中臥假人形，
靜臥箱中意自清。
藍毯輕蓋頭長安，
添得一抹溫馨情。

四周散落手袋眾，
獨近一只靠身旁。
無生之物演忘我，
靜觀其中想萬象。

paragraph: The image features a woman and a man in a wine bar, enjoying a glass of wine together. There are several chairs scattered around the room, including one that can be seen closer to the couple. A table is also present, providing additional seating for the guests.
answer:
燈光下影幽幽，酒吧裡佳人與郎侶，
瑰酒輕啜話悠悠，情意綿綿賦此時。
椅散周圍籠餘暉，桌旁更有客閒坐，
片刻歡聚共一室，紅酒語默心相繫。

paragraph: The image depicts a train traveling along a track near a river. There is a large building in the background, which could be a station or an office building. The train can be seen passing by several buildings, including a small house and a tall building. A number of people are also present in the scene, likely passengers on the train.
answer:
雲煙渺渺行無痕，鐵馬嘶嘶跨江濱。
水畔軌道通遠邑，列車經過夢繁紛。

樓台疊影藏曉霞，或是驛站或廈華。
小舍高樓交錯立，塵世喧囂自然化。

旅人搭載心向遠，機轟輪轉渡時川。
流光易逝景猶在，行過萬水又千山。

paragraph: The image depicts a man sitting on a couch while using a laptop. He is kneeling down and working on the computer, which can be seen from several angles in the room. There are various objects scattered around the room, including a chair, a lamp, and a vase.
answer:
行吟於蒼穹之下，我撰此幽墨樂章：
《居室畫意》

居間一隅，沐電波光，
獨坐長椅，筆耕不忙。
膝下承載，智慧之窗，
熒幕幾面，燈影交嚮。

散落星辰，生活縹緲，
椅、燈與花，物語無章。
尋常一景，世界微茫，
鍵盤敲出，心海濤涼。

通宵耕耘，《萬卷》成行，
家園凝思，夢筆飄揚。
誰言平凡，無以為觴？
此間有趣，藏於塵囊。

paragraph: The image features a man sitting on a bus with his dog in a backpack. The man is wearing a black jacket, while the dog is placed in a brown bag nearby. There are several other people present in the scene, including two men and a woman.
answer:
巴士行途間，君坐我依偎，
烏衣背影裡，小犬藏囊微。
棕囊緊鄰旁，溫柔共行止，
環顧車廂內，二男與嬌娘。

喧囂不擾靜，情誼隨輪轉，
旅途匆匆客，各懷心事懸。
共此閒暇刻，寄託於心田，
汪星眼望主，情深友伴然。

流轉間景遷，世間百態展，
不論行何處，眷屬是歸船。
一路風與雨，温暖在胸前，
行色匆匆裏，真摯愛不變。

paragraph: The image depicts a man and a child on a snowy slope, with the boy kneeling down next to him. The man is wearing skis while the child is sitting on the ground in front of him. There are several other people present in the scene, including a woman and a young girl. They are all dressed in winter attire, which adds to the festive atmosphere of the scene.
answer:
雪坡情深 致遠親情

白雪鋪坡畫闌珊，
童膝男側呈親暖。
雙板戲凌霜翔遠，
一抹童顏樂未寬。

寒風中嬉戲人群，
女子幼女共紛紜。
笑語織成冬季賦，
溫情裹於雪衣緩。

狂歡裡透親子情，
學步學 ski 喜又驚。
山風凜若赴盟約，
攜手共譜雪地經。

緬懷此刻永難忘，
片片飛雪譜新章。
冬日溫馨繪此景，
家和萬事皆頌揚。

paragraph: The image features two horses, one of which is wearing a mask over its eyes. Two other horses can be seen behind the fence, with one closer to the camera and the other further away. There are several trees in the background, providing shade for the horses as they roam around the field.
answer:
幽篁匿駿影，欄外伴馬嘶。
雙駿探前途，一帶蒙眼帷。
樹蔭擁翠幄，田野展遊蹄。
近遠隔籬障，悠然自在棲。

（幽深的樹林間掩藏著優秀的馬匹，欄杆之外還有伴侶相隨著嘶鳴。
兩匹馬兒探尋著未知的前途，其中一匹戴著遮蓋雙眼的面紗。
樹木的陰影投射著綠蔭如同帳篷，廣闊的田野上，馬兒自由地奔踏。
雖被籬笆隔開的距離近與遠，卻在這自由自在的居所中悠然地安居。）

paragraph: The image depicts a group of people walking around an elephant in a grassy area. There are several people present in the scene, including two men and one woman, who are standing near the elephant's trunk. They are enjoying their time with the elephant as it walks along the path. A number of trees can be seen in the background, adding to the natural beauty of the scene.
answer:
綠野象徜徉，人隨步徐行，
林間隱鳥影，蔽日翠葉濃。
壯士雙立側，佳人獨傍通，
象牙蟬鬢近，笑語振林風。

悠哉遊何逸，與獸共踏虹，
步履隨心轉，忘却塵世空。
繞樹扶斜陽，踏草赴遙東，
肩摩象軀暖，樂此不可終。

paragraph: The image depicts a skateboarder on a ramp, performing tricks while riding his skateboard. There is a graffiti-covered wall in the background, which adds to the overall aesthetic of the scene. A man can be seen standing at the top of the ramp, and there are several other people scattered around the area.
answer:
在斜坡輪翔的滑板俠，
身姿閃轉驚艷眾目光。
塗鴉壁畫錦繡背景，
添彩此場青春的戲框。

一人矗立於坡之巔，
目光凝視，意氣揚。
旁觀者眾，或站或坐，
各自欣賞，心悠揚。

輪下踏板舞翻雲，
空中演繹巧妙章。
激情燃燒，輪滑翔，
青春畫卷，動感強。

餘音繚繞於風中，
時光定格這一站。
快門留影，驚險記，
英姿飛揚，世代傳。

paragraph: The image features a young boy wearing a white shirt with a red and white tie. He is standing in front of a table, holding a book close to his face. There are several books scattered around the room, including one that is placed closer to the boy.
answer:
於書海間，一童子，
素衫添縷赤白絲。
案前靜立，捧卷親吟，
籍籍周遭，知己似。

瀛洋一隅，探奧秘，
字句飄搖，心飛揚。
近前一本，情更切，
學問無涯，少年忙。

paragraph: The image depicts a lush green field with two black horses standing in the distance. The animals appear to be enjoying their time on the grassy terrain, as they walk around and interact with each other. There is also a white horse near the middle of the field, which can be seen closer to the center of the scene.
answer:
綠野長隨碧草新，
黑馬雙行影似鄰。
徜徉恣意馳風趣，
絮語閒情自相親。

近傍中原一駒白，
獨立青天映日辰。
草原遼闊天地闊，
馬語嘶風譜新春。

paragraph: The image features a two-way traffic sign in the middle of a residential street. There is a stop sign located at the corner of the intersection, and another one can be found closer to the center of the scene. Two cars are also present in the scene, with one driving towards the left side of the intersection and the other driving towards the right side.
answer:
雙向車流顯示牌，
屹立宅邊道中央。
交叉口恭立停碑，
更有一簽居心旁。

兩輛車分道揚駕，
左右航線各自忙。
遵循規矩行善序，
人車和諧共安康。

paragraph: The image depicts a yellow train traveling down the tracks, passing through a field with trees in the background. The train is moving at a steady pace along the tracks, and there are several power lines visible throughout the scene. There is also a person sitting on the ground near the train, possibly waiting for the train to arrive.
answer:
黃鐵馳疾軌，旁經翠野畦。
樹影隨行遠，電纜繞天低。
一乘客地坐，似待駛來機。
穩節奏響徹，鐵龍裁地飛。

paragraph: The image depicts a living room with two couches, a television, and a coffee table. There is also a chair placed in the middle of the room, which can be seen from an overhead perspective. A bookcase is located on the right side of the room, providing additional storage space for books and other items.
answer:
懷古風清客廳靜，電光映照懶慵態。
兩榻相對文閒坐，中椅獨立秋思裁。
咖啡桌前閒物陳，靜物與人齊悠哉。
右側書櫃藏卷册，知音素友悠揮槐。

解：
此詩意圖以古風詩意描繪一個現代客廳的和諧靜謐，電視機的發光與沙發上的慵懶形成對比。對面的沙發提供了文靜之處，供閱讀或思考之時。中間獨立的椅子象徵著秋天深思的場所。茶几前的日常雜物與人一同享受寧靜時光。書櫃在一旁靜默地守護那些古今的知己，延展無盡的文化與智慧。

paragraph: The image depicts a clean, empty kitchen with a stove, sink, and window. There is also a chair placed in the middle of the room, providing additional seating for the viewer.
answer:
空廚淨影寂無聲，
爐灶窗邊添逸風。
一椅中室稀人坐，
獨留凝思與雲同。

清光透窗晨曦早，
水槽旁立意猶濃。
空間有序待佳肴，
靜坐空椅夢初鳴。

paragraph: The image features a snowboarder in the air, performing a jump on a snow-covered slope. There are two snowboarders present in the scene, one of whom is flying high in the air while riding his snowboard. Another snowboarder can be seen near the top of the hill, closer to the camera. A third snowboarder can be seen at the bottom of the hill, further away from the camera. All three snowboarders appear to be having fun as they perform their stunts and maneuvers through the snowy terrain.
answer:
雲巔跳躍翔雪中，
一板凌空展俠風。
碧巒滑影雙韻動，
碎雪飛揚追快蹤。

高處仰望驚鴻影，
鏡頭前端伴輕松。
又見山脚行者遠，
縱橫穿梭雪域中。

笑聲瀲灩寒空裡，
冰雪為坊舞未終。
天地間演勇者戲，
乘風破浪任逍遙。

paragraph: The image features a group of cows drinking from a watering hole in a grassy field. There are several cows present in the scene, with some standing closer to the water and others further away. Some of the cows appear to be resting on the ground, while others are perched on top of tall grasses. Horses can be seen wandering around the area as well, which adds to the natural beauty of the scene.
answer:
翠野牛群饮碧泉，
悠然草际映晴天。
几头卧地休憩兽，
更有高坡傲立牵。

马影徘徊增画卷，
野风悠哉舞翠烟。
清溪涓涓润心田，
和煦自然卷诗篇。

paragraph: The image features a small airplane flying in the clear blue sky. The plane is visible from several angles and can be seen at different distances throughout the scene. There is a propeller on the left side of the plane, while there is a landing gear on the right side. It appears that the plane is taking off or landing as it flies through the air.
answer:
翼展寬廣劃蒼穹，
晴空一道小型機。
左旋螺旋扇清風，
右輪起落地事宜。

遠翳近飛多角翔，
高空蒼藍入畫屏。
起降疏影添飛勢，
機翔雲海任翱翔。

paragraph: The image depicts a group of police officers riding horses down a city street. There are several men on horseback, some wearing yellow vests and others in fluorescent colors. Some of the men are standing closer to the center of the scene, while others are further away from the camera. They appear to be patrolling the area with their horses, which may be used for law enforcement purposes.
answer:
街頭馬蹄輕，銀盔影照明。
黃衣壯士馳，熒光襯征行。
巡邏群英俠，城畔警音清。
遠近鏡頭攝，和風護夜靜。

鐵騎掠街巷，威儀警衛生。
隊列擘新秩，平安是命名。
馬背英姿展，法紀歌遠程。
秩序隨馬走，城中月明明。

paragraph: The image depicts a white bowl with broccoli and cheese in it, placed on a wooden table. There is a spoon located near the center of the bowl, which can be used to scoop up the delicious dish.
answer:
翠綠錦繡一碗中，
白盤裝盛美味濃。
檀木桌上風雅陳，
銀匙偎侔待人同。

起鍋搘進芝士濃，
西蘭細蔓織心中。
細嚼慢嘗人欲醉，
味融香溢逐風送。

paragraph: The image depicts a group of skiers walking across a snowy field. There are five people in the scene, with one person closer to the camera and two others further away. They are all wearing ski poles as they walk along the trail, which is covered in snow. A number of trees can be seen in the background, adding to the overall beauty of the scene.
answer:
雪野行者

白雪無垠廣漠寒，
五影踏雪尋蹤難。
雙杖助行人先後，
樹影參天靜美看。

一縱身影略顯孤，
足下翻飛絮亂舞。
遠山含翠襯斜陽，
凜冬滑道樂無數。

paragraph: The image features a white plate with two sandwiches on it, one of which is cut in half. A knife is also present on the table, likely used to cut the sandwich into smaller pieces. There are some vegetables on the plate as well, including lettuce and tomatoes.
answer:
在白盤輕擺兩餐餅，
一劈為二刀痕清。
生菜番茄點綴中，
簡餐風味意未休。

切片之間情講究，
鋒利銀刃輕輕遊。
午餐繽紛素餐出，
招呼匆匆日光柔。
